source_item.name: Lesser Rune of the Void Ritual

effects.display_string: Set: Your spells and abilities have a small chance to hit a Jackpot! granting you Clearcasting and 5% increased spell damage for 12 sec. Casting Touch of the Magi always hits a Jackpot!
Set: When you hit a Jackpot!, you also gain Aether Attunement at 100% effectiveness.

spells.description: Equip: Your damaging spells and abilities have a chance to deal 99,258 damage to your target. The magic school chosen is based upon your selection of socketed Khaz Algar gems.
Equip: Your damaging spells and abilities have a chance to deal 99,258 damage to your target. The magic school chosen is based upon your selection of socketed Khaz Algar gems.
Use: Removes all movement impairing effects and all effects which cause loss of control of your character. (2 Min Cooldown)

effects.display_string: Set: Increases your Intellect by 12% and your Stamina by 10% when in Arenas, Battlegrounds, and War Mode.

spells.description: Equip: Your spells and abilities have a chance to grant 5,445 primary stat for 20 sec.
